backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Digital Forge ICP platform, handling access control initialization, token creation with payment validation, rate limiting, input sanitization, and treasury fee enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing view routing across five pages, authentication state, profile setup modal display, and global providers (theme, query client, toaster).
frontend/src/components/BuyMeACoffee.tsx: Inline donation component that fetches the treasury address, toggles an expandable wallet address display, and provides copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with Digital Forge branding, navigation links, and an embedded BuyMeACoffee support section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with the Digital Forge logo, auth-gated nav items, Internet Identity login/logout, and a mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog component that collects and saves a new user's profile (name, username, email) using Internet Identity authentication, with form validation and mutation via `useSaveCallerUserProfile`.
frontend/src/components/WalletButton.tsx: A UI button component that handles Plug wallet connection states (detecting, not installed, disconnected, connected) and provides a dropdown menu for copying address, viewing on explorer, reconnecting, or disconnecting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, token listing/fetching/creation, and related mutations with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: A React hook that manages Plug wallet detection, connection, auto-reconnect, session persistence, and ICP transfer operations with timeout handling and debug logging.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines the global CSS for the app using Tailwind, importing Google Fonts and establishing a dark 'Dark Forge' theme with OKLCH color tokens, custom forge-specific utility classes (gradients, glows, cards), and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that renders the React app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CreateTokenWizard.tsx: A multi-step wizard page for creating ICP tokens, handling form state for token configuration (basic info, tax modules, media/meta), payment verification, and submission via backend query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page displaying the authenticated user's tokens, activity metrics, and global platform stats, with token cards showing supply, tax, and status information.
frontend/src/pages/ForgedTokens.tsx: Community explorer page that lists all forged tokens with search/filter functionality, displaying each token's supply, tax rates, modules, and canister details in card format.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing landing page showcasing platform features and a step-by-step guide for forging tokens, with a hero section and wallet-connection-gated navigation to the token creation wizard.
frontend/src/pages/TokenLookup.tsx: React page component that lets users search for a deployed token by canister ID, displays token metadata (status, supply, tax rates, dates), and supports clipboard copy of key fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with forge/metallurgy-inspired design tokens including custom colors, fonts (Inter, Rajdhani, Orbitron), box shadows, gradients, and keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing the Digital Forge ICP token factory platform architecture, known issues (transient keyword, frontend/backend mismatches), existing features, and fix requests at schema version 1.0.0.
